sentence: Nearing the halfway mark in today's session, here are the individual equity names with the most call and put buying on optionMONSTER's ActionTracker data system.
Home Depot (HD): Traders bought 8,000 weekly 75 puts expiring this Friday for $0.42, along with 8,000 of the weekly 74s for $0.16, looking for the home-improvement stock to push lower.

(See related story )

Pinnacle Entertainment (PNK): Some 4,200 December 25 puts were bought, with the largest blocks fetching $1.80, as investors brace for downside in the casino operator.
Seabridge Gold (SA): Some 10,000 of the November 10 calls were bought, mostly for $0.85 to $1.05, looking for a rally in the precious-metals stock.

(See related story)
